Author: Kaz Wolfe
Name: XIVDeck Game Plugin
Description:
***THIS PLUGIN IS IN THE PRERELEASE/TESTING PHASE. EXPECT BUGS. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.***

This plugin allows players to place virtually any hotbar-able action onto a Stream Deck, including hotbar slots 
themselves. Actions are called directly, meaning no keybinds or awkward settings are necessary.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the
Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
Punchline: Integrate your Stream Deck with Final Fantasy XIV!
Changelog:
***THIS PLUGIN IS IN THE PRERELEASE/TESTING PHASE***

Release 0.0.2 fixes the following problems:
  - The plugin is not installable due to improper naming of, well, everything.
  - Add error handling to TickScheduler to post exceptions to chat.
  - Add some extra safety checks in a few critical places
  - Fix a problem where game state was being loaded too early, resulting in improper locks.
  - Fix a problem where too much was being passed to Framework
  - Fix a problem where locked General Actions were not showing

Release 0.0.2 does not modify the XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin. 
Release Notes: https://github.com/KazWolfe/XIVDeck/releases/tag/v0.0.2
